txt.en: 'You dare confront me! I shall claim you for flame.'
'I salute your resolve, but this is far from over. Arise brethren, help to seal my wounds!'
'Tenacious creatures, I will give you that. Come brethren fill me with ancient rage!'
'You pathetic creatures. You think this is done? It is far from over. Arise, arise!'
'Come then, intruders. Let us see if you have mettle.'
'Long have we held this place and long we shall hold it still.'
'Come forth children, let us welcome these new recruits and show them our resolve!'
The drake matron appears to have lost interest in the battle.
'This place is shut to the living. You shall soon join the Dead!'
'Come my winged children, strike them with your claws!'
'The living, here in our halls?'
As the Huorn stirs to life the wood troll guardians begin their assault.
Rooting itself deep within the ground, the Huorn becomes invulnerable.
The fumarole sputters to life, expelling deadly úrfon.
'Brethren, arise and let us test these fools'!
The fumarole sputters and the nature of the úrfon changes.
'We will fight on and my wounds will be closed by new bearers!'
'I call the flame to consume you!'
'Still you resist the inevitable. Death is all that awaits you!'
'No. I will not face you outside my realm.'
'I am of the flame and so flame shall heal me!'
'Your defeat will fuel my rage!'
'I grow tired of playing. Death will claim you all! Arise brethren, arise!'
